rules_text: Draw two cards. If you have no cards in hand and there are no cards in your graveyard, draw seven cards instead.
flavor_text:
[i]“As the star coalesced, he turned to his partner, joy in his eyes. ‘You know what this means? We can try it all again!'”
—Azamir, “Planeswalker's Whimsy”[/i]
notes: fluffy: moved instead to end (tezzeret artifice master), -dashgap
